page.title: 07A Headteacher's Day.LISVANE
page.content: {A typical day in the life of a Head.} Wake 07.00,bath,breakfast comprising meusli & glass of cold water. Dress,'hot brush' hair,leave for work 08.10.School,visits from caretaker & Deputy Head,see to correspndence.Bell 08.55, assembly 09.10.Write urgent letter to Director,re staffing,interrupted by 10 phone calls & 8 visitors.11.10,observe probationary teacher,follow by discussion in lunch break.Supervise children eating lunch & teach recorder group for 20 mins. School commences 13.15, eat my school lunch.From 13.50 until 15.15 teach J4,breaking off to see 3 visitors.15.45 to 16,30,prepare school hall for evening disco.Home,bite to eat,return to school 17.30.Disco ends 20.30. Home,housework,read,wash hair & bed by 23.00.
